statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); git_info=""; if git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$cwd" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=" on $branch"; fi; fi; printf "\033[2m%s in %s%s | %s\033[0m" "$(whoami)" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_info" "$model"
